DESCRIPTION: Fish are Colorless #b0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and #yExhaust.
Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.
Effect triggers only if there are no other cards in your hand.
When you complete a #yQuest, obtain its associated #yReward.
One in five card rewards will contain a Foil card. NL #gShiny!
Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.
Effect triggers when you obtain this card.
Move to the next room of the Dungeon and activate its effects.
